executable.title: Enhance Tubes Using Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate LDA or PCA for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.
